name: from the balcony
description:
it's been very cold and rainy in valencia spain the past few days. since i can't sit out on my balcony and play guitar like i have been doing every day, i decided to make a game about it on the laptop of my very kind new friend anna. click the mouse and something will happen, press the space bar and something else will happen.

i'd like to turn this into more of a real game but i had a lot of fun on the start to learning love2d!

ps coding on a czech keyboard is very hard. the z and the y keys are switched
